item.title: Resurfacing vehicles parked on Longmead Drive, Sidcup, 13th October
item.description:
I cannot believe your Riney Contractors have parked just along from the entrance to Longmead Drive, Sidcup. I know work is due to commence at the other end of Longmead Drive but surely a more sensible position would have been more appropriate.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1, Longmead Drive, Albany Park, Sidcup, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Grass and bushes need cutting on path, 13th October
item.description:

item.title: Vehicles turning right driving on wrong side of road to cross Bounds Green Road, 13th October
item.description:
Please consider adding a no right turn from Whittington Road. Vehicles turning right on Bounds Green Road are having to drive the wrong way towards on coming traffic to get passed centre of road devider. When I'm on my bike in the cycle lane this is quite disconcerting.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bounds Green Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Flytipping not sorted on Roydene Road, 13th October
item.description:
This Flytipping has been here for nearly two months Greenwich council please remove as itâ€™s becoming a health hazard for the residents who live here. In address to this itâ€™s a visual eyesore that brings the neighbourhood down. It should be pointed out this has been reported two times already. Please fix tomorrow and collect this dated 14th of October 2025.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Roydene Road, Plumstead, London
Report on FixMyStreet
